name: Codename: Horus Prototype Game 2018 #heartjam
description:
Codename: Horus was part of a 72 hour game jam and my first playable game.  This runs 100% custom code built by me as part of my Dummy.JS game engine project. Extra big thank you to the #heartjam organizers for the inspiration! Code on.
CONTROLS: w,a,s,d

Enter the Time Portal to refill your Soul Clock before time runs out!
